root: ^I am glad to find you safe.
^I'm just as glad to be safe.
^I would have never seen it coming...
^I'm a detective, and even I didn't see it coming.
^You were about to blame yourself for the war, but I forbid you.
^In truth, I admire you too much to allow myself to see you put blame on yourself.
^You are the person I aspire to be, and I do not aspire to be a failure.
^You are not a failure. You are a hero.
^I don't know if I would say that, Galedric.
^There was a moment today, one where I thought you may be dead.
^The sensation that overcame me was overbearing.
^The dread burned a whole in my heart.
^I cannot bear to see you in that sort of danger again.
^And I know you to be honorable.
^I suppose what I mean is, I wish to spend the rest of my life with you.
^I may not need to protect you, but I at least wish to provide for you.
^And when the day is done, I wish to be by your side.
^When I am with you, I am happy. I must admit-
^I will return safely from House Cherry Blossom, and when I do, let us share our lives together.
^It will not be our final farewell.
